about_the_game:
This is a tower defense game with minimalist design. It encourages strategic thinking and time management. There will be waves of enemies with different features and you must defend your path with strategic tower placement.

  • Clean Graphics: Minimalist design that don't bother your eyes.
  • Upgradable Tower Types: Some have longer range, some have more rate of fire… You should build them wisely.
  • Different Enemy Types: Many types of enemies that will challenge you with different features.
  • In-Game Wiki: Everything is well documented and easy to understand.
  • Theme Customization: If you want, you can change background and path colors.
